name: Golden Patient 2 - Heart Failure & COPD Patient
remarks: Robert Chen - 72M comprehensive cardiovascular/pulmonary test patient
COMPREHENSIVE RESOURCE COVERAGE - ALL TRDataServices resource types with HIGH VOLUME
LABS: 12 BNP panels, 8 Troponin, 10 CBC, 10 CMP, 8 Lipid, 6 D-Dimer, 8 Thyroid
IMAGING: 6 Chest X-Rays, 4 Echocardiograms, 2 CT Chest, 2 Cardiac Cath studies
MEDICATIONS: 20+ orders (Furosemide, Metoprolol, Warfarin, Albuterol, Spiriva, Digoxin)
PROCEDURES: 15+ procedures (EKG, Spirometry, Oxygen therapy, Cardiac rehab, Cardioversion)
CARE PLANS: 4 comprehensive (CHF management, COPD management, Anticoagulation, Fall prevention)
ENCOUNTERS: 14 encounters over 18 months (ER admission, cardiology, pulmonology, primary care)
Trend testing: EF 25% → 35%, BNP 1200 → 400, FEV1 45% → 52%, Weight 98kg → 89kg
CHF (NYHA Class III→II) + COPD (GOLD Stage 3) + Atrial Fibrillation + CAD + Pulmonary HTN
SUFFICIENT data for: 'recent BNP', 'last 5 troponin', 'echo results', 'lung function trend'
Immunizations (auto-generated by Synthea), Allergies (ACE inhibitors), Social History (former smoker)
